TopicTitle: Smoother Scrolling in Map View, Regular Flight View, and the VAB

Articles.Content: I noticed in KSP 2 that scrolling is extremely rigid and not smooth at all. When you swung the camera in KSP 1, it would slowly stop moving, which was present in the Map View, Flight View, etc. I liked this feature as it felt more natural. I just would like the devs to consider this as a feature. Thanks for reading this!

I second this. Instead of having the camera make discrete jumps dollying in and out when I use my scroll wheel, making the camera feel physical, and having it smoothly dolly in and out would be fantastic

Turns out that Mr. Simpson himself has confirmed that it is planned for there to be more smoother scrolling in KSP 2! This is great news to hear, I thought I might put it out there.
